mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods(goodsid, category, productname, description, size, price, stockquantity, issoldout, filename, filesize, regdate, caution, deliveryreturnsexchangesinfo) VALUES(#{goodsid}, #{category}, #{productname}, #{description}, #{size}, #{price}, #{stockquantity}, #{issoldout}, #{filename}, #{filesize}, #{regdate}, #{caution}, #{deliveryreturnsexchangesinfo})
mapper.select: SELECT goodsid, category, productname, description, size, price, stockquantity, issoldout, filename, filesize, regdate, caution, deliveryreturnsexchangesinfo FROM goods ORDER BY productname

SELECT goodsid, category, productname, description, size, price, stockquantity, issoldout, filename, filesize, regdate, caution, deliveryreturnsexchangesinfo FROM goods WHERE productname LIKE #{keyword} ORDER BY productname
mapper.update: UPDATE goods SET category = #{category}, productname = #{productname}, description = #{description}, size = #{size}, price = #{price}, stockquantity = #{stockquantity}, issoldout = #{issoldout}, filename = #{filename}, filesize = #{filesize}, regdate = #{regdate}, caution = #{caution}, deliveryreturnsexchangesinfo = #{deliveryreturnsexchangesinfo} WHERE goodsid = #{goodsid}
mapper.select: SELECT goodsid, category, productname, description, size, price, stockquantity, issoldout, filename, filesize, regdate, caution, deliveryreturnsexchangesinfo FROM goods ORDER BY productname LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
